patch.summary: Patch the Internal CICD Config for the specified tenant, star system and application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: ID of the application to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a tenant and star system pair.

parameters.name: starSystemId
parameters.description: ID of the star system aka (GCC) project to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a single tenant.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within the single CICD Manager Service database.

200.description: Successfully patched the Internal CICD Configuration.

apiTestsBuildEnabled.description: Is Api Test Bench build enabled.
Should the API Tests build be enabled.

finishBuildTriggerEnabled.description: Should the API Tests build run automatically after the Build Application build is finished.

buildEnabled.description: Should the Behavior Test build be enabled

vcsTriggerEnabled.description: Should the tests run automatically on any change in code (for all branches except gw-releases)

verifySuitesPresenceEnabled.description: Should the configured test suites presence in the codebase be verified prior to running tests, failing in case any test suite is not found.

buildEnabled.description: Should the Behavior Test build be enabled.

vcsTriggerEnabled.description: Should the Behavior Tests run automatically on any change in code (for all branches except gw-releases).

verifySuitesPresenceEnabled.description: Should the configured test suites presence in the codebase be verified prior to running tests, failing in the case any of the configured test suites is not found.

token.description: Authentication token for the BitBucket user used for the commit status publisher feature.

user.description: Name of the BitBucket user used for the commit status publisher feature.

branchFilter.description: Denotes which branches of the application should be included in the Build Schedule. The parameter uses the TeamCity branch filter notation.

enabled.description: Should the Build Schedule be enabled.

withPendingChangesOnly.description: Should builds be triggeredd only on branches with pending changes.

applicationId.description: ID of the application to which the Build Schedule applies, unique within a tenant and star system pair.

branchFilter.description: Denotes which branches of the application should be included in the Build Schedule. The parameter uses the TeamCity branch filter notation.

enabled.description: Should the Build Schedule be enabled.

withPendingChangesOnly.description: Should builds be triggeredd only on branches with pending changes.

applicationId.description: ID of the application to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a tenant and star system pair.
ID of the application to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a tenant and star system pair.

starSystemId.description: ID of the star system aka (GCC) project to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a single tenant.

tenantId.description: ID of the tenant to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within the single CICD Manager Service database.

applicationId.description: ID of the application to which the CICD configuration applies, unique within a tenant and star system pair.

jacocoScanBasePackages.description: List of base packages for Jacoco code coverage scan. Code coverage will be perormed for specified and all nested packages.

jacocoVersion.description: Version of jacoco to use during GUnit tests.

testEnv.description: Value of "env" parameter for running tests. If not set or blank, framework-specific defaults will be used in TeamCity build configurations.

applicationId.description: Id of application, unique within tenant and project pair

accessControlExposeHeaders.description: List of safelisted response headers to be exposed via CORS

deploymentType.description: Type of the digital application deployment.

httpdVersion.description: Httpd client version. Usage of 'alpine' will be enforced.

httpdVersion.description: The httpd server version, used to host Digital Applications. Usage of 'alpine' will be enforced.

appImageRepo.description: Name of the Docker repository on ECR.
The name of the ECR Docker repository with the application images built in the customer pipeline.

assuranceToolsImage.description: Repository and tag of the Docker image (residing in the shared ECR registry) containing the tools used for the static analysis build.

baseDockerImage.description: Application docker image name to use.

gtFrameworkDockerImage.description: Docker image to run GT Framework tests in.

gunitServerTestsRunMemSizeMB.description: Size of memory for running server tests in MB.

gunitSmokeTestsRunMemSizeMB.description: Size of memory for running smoke tests in MB.

insuranceSuiteBuildTasks.description: List of gwb tasks used during Build Application pipelines for Insurance Suite applications. List requires to contain 'warTomcatDbcp' and 'genDataDictionary' tasks for building process

log4jCheckEnabled.description: Should the runtime classpath be searched for vulnerable versions of the log4j-core library before every build, failing in the case any such version is found.

solrBaseDockerImage.description: Solr base docker image name to use.

testEnv.description: Value of "env" parameter for running tests. If not set or blank, framework-specific defaults will be used in TeamCity build configurations.

sshKeyName.description: Name of SSH key used for the connection to the repository.

appSrcUrl.description: URL (with the SSH protocol) of the Git repository with the application sources.

path.description: A JSON Pointer on which operation is performed

value.description: The value to be used within the operations.

channel.description: Slack Channel name where notification will be sent.

enableCustomerSpecificProfile.description: Should the inspections with customer-specific profile be enabled.

inspectionErrorThreshold.description: The threshold of error level inspections that are allowed for SnowPatrol.

enabled.description: Should Solr support be enabled. According to this flag, the 'Build And Package Solr' build and the 'Dockerize Solr' build will be visible or not in the applicable pipelines.
Should Solr support be enabled. According to this flag, the 'Build And Package Solr' build and the 'Dockerize Solr' build will be visible or not in the applicable pipelines.
Should the Static Analysis build be enabled.

postMerge.description: Should be included in the test builds only running on the default branch.

preMerge.description: Should be included in the test builds running on all custom branches.

suiteName.description: Fully qualified name of the class containing the test suite.

enabled.description: Is Update build enabled. Update build updates customer code to version specified by image tag parameter.
Should the Update build be enabled. Update build updates customer code to version specified by image tag parameter.
Is Verify Blue/Green build enabled. Verify blue/green provides customer for testing their new configuration is compatible for blue/green upgrade.
Should the Verify Blue/Green build be enabled. Verify blue/green provides a way for customers to test if their new configuration is compatible for blue/green upgrade.
